footer.description: María La Baja is a municipality in the Colombian Caribbean that celebrates its Afro-descendant identity and its process of social transformation.

postConflict.title: Post-Conflict in María La Baja
postConflict.subtitle: An overview of the social process in the Montes de María region, marked by persistent challenges and community resilience.
postConflict.noteDescription: The post-conflict in María La Baja shows that the end of armed hostilities is not synonymous with the end of social violence. It is crucial to guarantee access to basic rights (such as drinking water) and effective land restitution for lasting peace.
